channel.title: My server demotes my staff randomly? [PI]
channel.description: I don't know the cause of the problem but it keeps happening and i have looked all over and cant seem to find the source of it. I am using a iHybrid Source and it never did this before. Any possible ideas on a simple fix???

item.title: My server demotes my staff randomly? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

you can always download another copy of it from the server downloads, its up to you.

Read full topic

item.source: My server demotes my staff randomly? [PI]

item.title: My server demotes my staff randomly? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

Id say…yeah definetly make sure you keep a duplicate of your server files incase something happens…like on a flash drive if you have one. but remember, everytime you update your server, remember to replace your duplicated files with the updates ones :), and make sure your updates work before you update your duplicates

item.title: My server demotes my staff randomly? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Not a single thing on my VPS. This is odly strange… It just disconnects the staff member and they are demoted… nothing on the server console. Veng erver since you helped me with blocking admins dropping, it has been doing this. Could it be from something i edited in PlayerAssistant.java?

Read full topic

I used that source for a while, and i had no problems with it. Vain, i agree with you though, it could be a virus. But maybe while you were messing around in the coding you messed something up…who knows…
